com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class WPopup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWComponent
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WPopup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WComponent, WebComponent, Serializable

    public class WPopup
extends AbstractWComponent
    This component enables a pop up browser window to an arbitrary location. Pop-ups are initially invisible, to display a pop-up, call AbstractWComponent.setVisible(boolean). This will set the pop-up visible for the render cycle only.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
